metadata.Title: CVE-2017-12642 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - low.
metadata.Description: ImageMagick 7.0.6-1 has a memory leak vulnerability in ReadMPCImage in coders\mpc.c.

notes.Note: mdeslaur> 0091-Fix-a-leak-in-mpc-file-due-to-corrupted-profiles.patch in unstable 0278-CVE-2017-12642-Fix-memory-leak-vulnerability-in-ReadMPCImage-1-2.patch and 0279-CVE-2017-12642-Fix-memory-leak-vulnerability-in-ReadMPCImage-2-2.patch in wheezy not fixing memory leak in trusty and xenial

criterions.comment: imagemagick: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
